node.name: SafeRoute
node.description: This android application was made to tackle the problems faced due to the coronavirus outbreak.This app maps infected patients of covid-19 in your city and shows containment zones with red hotspots on the map fragment..

node.name: Licence-Plate-Detection
node.description: This is a licence plate detection system where the program detects and recognizes characters in licence plate and appends it to a CSV sheet with the timestamp of arrival for keeping a record

node.name: Automatic-Attendance-Using-Face-Recognition
